articles.author: TOI World Desk
articles.title: CEO caught 'cheating' at Coldplay concert: Andy Byron gushed about Kristin Cabot's hiring, called her 'ex - The Times of India
articles.description: US News: Astronomer CEO Andy Byron who was allegedly caught cheating with his colleague Kristin Cabot at a Coldplay concert in Boston showered praises on Cabot.
